scripts.move:compile: export $(cat .env | xargs) && aptos move compile --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses module_addr=$(./scripts/get_module_addr.sh)
scripts.move:test: export $(cat .env | xargs) && aptos move test --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses module_addr=$(./scripts/get_module_addr.sh)
scripts.move:publish: export $(cat .env | xargs) && aptos move publish --package-dir move --skip-fetch-latest-git-deps --named-addresses module_addr=$(./scripts/get_module_addr.sh) --profile=$APP_NETWORK && ./scripts/gen_abi.sh
